languages.text: "Вам были видения? Я тоже видел лишь старца... Хоть сражался он с силой, недоступной обычным смертным. Быстрый, смертоносный. Славный, хоть и мрачный конец он избрал себе". {n}Ульфар бросает на Кибеллу задумчивый взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вам были видения? Я тоже видел лишь старца... Хоть сражался он с силой, недоступной обычным смертным. Быстрый, смертоносный. Славный, хоть и мрачный конец он избрал себе". {n}Ульфар бросает на Кибеллу задумчивый взгляд.{/n}

languages.text: "Did you two have visions? All I saw was the old man himself... Though he did fight with a strength that is beyond mere mortals. Swift and deadly, he was. He chose himself a good death, even if it was bleak." {n}Ulfar looks at Kibellah pensively.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вам были видения? Я тоже видел лишь старца... Хоть сражался он с силой, недоступной обычным смертным. Быстрый, смертоносный. Славный, хоть и мрачный конец он избрал себе". {n}Ульфар бросает на Кибеллу задумчивый взгляд.{/n}

"Did you two have visions? All I saw was the old man himself... Though he did fight with a strength that is beyond mere mortals. Swift and deadly, he was. He chose himself a good death, even if it was bleak." {n}Ulfar looks at Kibellah pensively.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Ha tenido dos visiones? Yo solo vi al viejo... Aunque peleaba con una fuerza mucho más allá de los meros mortales. Era rápido y letal. Escogió una buena muerte, aunque también fuese algo deprimente». {n}Ulfar mira a Kibellah, pensativo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did you two have visions? All I saw was the old man himself... Though he did fight with a strength that is beyond mere mortals. Swift and deadly, he was. He chose himself a good death, even if it was bleak." {n}Ulfar looks at Kibellah pensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha tenido dos visiones? Yo solo vi al viejo... Aunque peleaba con una fuerza mucho más allá de los meros mortales. Era rápido y letal. Escogió una buena muerte, aunque también fuese algo deprimente». {n}Ulfar mira a Kibellah, pensativo.{/n}

languages.text: 「二人は幻を見たのか？俺が見たのはあの老人だけだったが…奴は常人を超えた力で戦っていた。素早く、容赦がなかった。絶望的ではあったが、良い死を選んだ」{n}ウルファーは物思いにふけってキベラを見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did you two have visions? All I saw was the old man himself... Though he did fight with a strength that is beyond mere mortals. Swift and deadly, he was. He chose himself a good death, even if it was bleak." {n}Ulfar looks at Kibellah pensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「二人は幻を見たのか？俺が見たのはあの老人だけだったが…奴は常人を超えた力で戦っていた。素早く、容赦がなかった。絶望的ではあったが、良い死を選んだ」{n}ウルファーは物思いにふけってキベラを見た。{/n}

languages.text: “你们两个都看到异象了吗？我只看到了那个老人本身……不过，他的战斗能力远远超出了凡人，他的动作迅捷、致命。他为自己选择了光荣的死亡，尽管死得有些凄凉。”{n}乌尔法若有所思地看着绮贝菈。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did you two have visions? All I saw was the old man himself... Though he did fight with a strength that is beyond mere mortals. Swift and deadly, he was. He chose himself a good death, even if it was bleak." {n}Ulfar looks at Kibellah pensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你们两个都看到异象了吗？我只看到了那个老人本身……不过，他的战斗能力远远超出了凡人，他的动作迅捷、致命。他为自己选择了光荣的死亡，尽管死得有些凄凉。”{n}乌尔法若有所思地看着绮贝菈。{/n}

languages.text: "Hattet Ihr beide Visionen? Ich habe nur den alten Mann selbst gesehen ... Allerdings kämpfte er mit einer Stärke, die bloßen Sterblichen verwehrt ist. Er war schnell und tödlich. Er wählte einen guten, wenngleich trostlosen Tod." {n}Ulfar betrachtet Kibellah nachdenklich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did you two have visions? All I saw was the old man himself... Though he did fight with a strength that is beyond mere mortals. Swift and deadly, he was. He chose himself a good death, even if it was bleak." {n}Ulfar looks at Kibellah pensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hattet Ihr beide Visionen? Ich habe nur den alten Mann selbst gesehen ... Allerdings kämpfte er mit einer Stärke, die bloßen Sterblichen verwehrt ist. Er war schnell und tödlich. Er wählte einen guten, wenngleich trostlosen Tod." {n}Ulfar betrachtet Kibellah nachdenklich.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous avez eu des visions, vous autres ? Pour ma part, tout ce que j'ai vu, c'est ce vieil homme... Encore qu'il se battait avec une force bien supérieure à celle du commun des mortels, en une danse aussi vive que meurtrière. Il a choisi une mort honorable, si lugubre fût-elle. » {n}Ulfar adresse un regard songeur à Kibellah.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did you two have visions? All I saw was the old man himself... Though he did fight with a strength that is beyond mere mortals. Swift and deadly, he was. He chose himself a good death, even if it was bleak." {n}Ulfar looks at Kibellah pensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez eu des visions, vous autres ? Pour ma part, tout ce que j'ai vu, c'est ce vieil homme... Encore qu'il se battait avec une force bien supérieure à celle du commun des mortels, en une danse aussi vive que meurtrière. Il a choisi une mort honorable, si lugubre fût-elle. » {n}Ulfar adresse un regard songeur à Kibellah.{/n}

languages.text: "İki görü mü gördün? Benim tek gördüğüm ihtiyar adamdı... Gerçi sıradan fânilerin sahip olabileceğinin ötesinde bir kuvvetle dövüştü. Çevik ve ölümcüldü. Kasvetli olsa da düzgün bir ölüm seçti." {n}Ulfar, dalgınca Kibellah'ya bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Did you two have visions? All I saw was the old man himself... Though he did fight with a strength that is beyond mere mortals. Swift and deadly, he was. He chose himself a good death, even if it was bleak." {n}Ulfar looks at Kibellah pensively.{/n}
